name: Baby Hazel: Preschool Picnic
description: Hurray! It is picnic time at Baby Hazel's preschool. Baby Hazel and her friends are excited about their visit to a water park. Baby Hazel is busy packing her necessities. Can you help Baby Hazel in packing her bag with the essentials and gears required to get wet in a pool. Also go along with the kids in their school bus and enjoy fun filled travel time. At the water park make sure kids are well taken care of, as they are too young to be left unattended. Fulfill their demands on time so that they enjoy their picnic time to the fullest at the water park.
